description: Sometimes people have zero ambitions and are happy with what they have. I don't always get it but I respect the choice. This boy worked as an ordinary factory worker and wanted exactly the same job just better paid. I was a bit disappointed because there are plenty of jobs like that available. It ruined my plan to offer him something special to get rid of his clothes. To my surprise he was interested enough to undress and show me his lean body anyways. I couldn't let such a cutie with a big fat cock to slip through my fingers. I think he was in very serious financial problems, otherwise he wouldn't have let me wreck his sweet tight ass like I did. I'm sure this was the most painful interview the boy ever had to endure. The job definitely wasn't worth it but at least I was more than satisfied.
title: Dirty Scout 201
